abstract: A list of resources on Twitter, Facebook, YouTube and other social media platforms focused on Hurricane Irene.
snippet: A list of resources on Twitter, Facebook, YouTube and other social media platforms focused on Hurricane Irene.
lead_paragraph: With more than 50 percent of people in the United States saying they now use social media, according to a new Pew study released on Friday, it is not surprising that people are turning to Twitter, Facebook, YouTube and other platforms for breaking news updates, videos, photos, emergency information and conversation about Hurricane Irene.

headline.main: Social Media State-by-State Guide for Hurricane Irene
